column1: Uchi////The sushi itself is fresh yet they are a little bit overpriced IMO. I personally would prefer going to Seiwa market to buy sashimi there instead of going to Uchi. Nonetheless
column2: the customer service is excellent and the ambiance is not bad
column3: and definitely can be better. I think I will recommend this place if you feel like splurging your money or for a special occasion
column4: and do not care your food is not worth the price tag. One item that I think is worth mentioning is their fried milk dessert
column5: is reasonably price and extremely delicious. Other than that
column6: the sashimi slices are a little bit too thin for the price we are paying for.
